|`kube-audit` |Kubernetes Audit |[AKSAudit](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/aksaudit)<p>Contains all Kubernetes API Server audit logs including events with the get and list verbs. These events are useful for monitoring all of the interactions with the Kubernetes API. To limit the scope to modifying operations see the AKSAuditAdmin table.|Yes|No|[Queries](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/aksaudit)|No |
|`kube-audit-admin` |Kubernetes Audit Admin Logs |[AKSAuditAdmin](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/aksauditadmin)<p>Contains Kubernetes API Server audit logs excluding events with the get and list verbs. These events are useful for monitoring resource modification requests made to the Kubernetes API. To see all modifying and non-modifying operations see the AKSAudit table.|Yes|No|[Queries](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/aksauditadmin)|No |

These diagnostic logs have distinct Category entries corresponding their diagnostic log setting (e.g. kube-apiserver, kube-audit-admin).|Yes|No|[Queries](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/akscontrolplane)|No |

These diagnostic logs have distinct Category entries corresponding their diagnostic log setting (e.g. kube-apiserver, kube-audit-admin).|Yes|No|[Queries](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/akscontrolplane)|No |
